entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts. He is described as being forgetful about how little Harry knows about Quidditch.

entities.name: quidditch
entities.description: Quidditch is the wizard sport that Hagrid is explaining to Harry. It is described as being played on broomsticks and having four balls.

entities.name: madam malkin's
entities.description: Madam Malkin's is a shop where Harry bought his school robes. A pale boy was also in the store.

entities.name: leaky cauldron
entities.description: The Leaky Cauldron is a pub that serves as an entrance to the wizarding world for Muggles like Harry's parents.

relationships.description: Harry visited Madam Malkin's with his parents.
